title: Episode 215: Wack Ass Jordans (Feat. Sir)
itunes:title: Episode 215: Wack Ass Jordans (Feat. Sir)
description:
Singer/songwriter Sir joins the ladies of Lip Service this week. He opens up about his marriage, the most vindictive thing he's ever done (I'll give you a hint...it involves a vacuum and breaking windows), situations in which it’s okay to lie, and much more! Sir even breaks down how going on a “break” with his lady helped save their relationship. Enjoy! ***LIP SERVICE LIVE TOUR*** October 20th - Philadelphia, PC October 21st - NYC, NY October 27th - Charlotte, NC October 28th - Washington DC October
